{"step_by_step_thinking": "KRI paste is a type of dental paste used in endodontic treatment. To determine its composition, we can analyze each option. Option C includes iodoform, camphor, parachlorophenol, and menthol. Option D includes parachlorophenol, camphor, and menthol.
